objectives.name: obj1
objectives.dqlQuery:
fetch logs
| filter contains(dt.process.name, "simplenodeservice.simplenode-gitlab-staging")
| filter contains (k8s.namespace.name, "simplenode-gitlab-staging")
| filter not contains (content, "/healtz") AND not contains (content, "/healthz")
| filter contains (content, "/api/invoke")
| parse content, "DATA 'rt:' SPACE? FLOAT:responsetime "
| filter isNotNull(responsetime)
| summarize avg(responsetime), alias:response_time
